import React,{useParams} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Img,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products_and_images/products' const ProductScreen = () => { const {id} = useParams const product = products.find(p => p._id === useParams.id) return
{product.name}
} export default ProductScreen
